::Rodimus prime::

The ship groaned, and moned.
"I dont like the sound of that, but we have to keep fighting." He said,
still fighting Preds.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit opened his comm-link to Megatron.
"Sir. Land Mine and Time Bomb, just walked out of here. The sensors show
them heading for the Maxi base. We just lost soldiers, Sir." He said, to
the comm.
